snippet.title: Heavy Cargo - The Truck Simulator | Official Trailer | Aerosoft
snippet.description:
COMING SOON | https://store.steampowered.com/app/1474930/Heavy_Cargo__The_Truck_Simulator/

Heavy Cargo - The Truck Simulator was developed in close cooperation with our partner ‘Universal Transport’ and presents the work of a company that is specialized in heavy cargo transports in a realistic way. Everything is in your hands – from planning the challenging missions to performing them. Do you have what it takes to take ships, rotor blades or locomotives to their destination and found your own heavy cargo empire?

For more news and information follow us: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Aerosoft
Twitter: https://twitter.com/aerosoftgmbh 

#heavycargo #toxtronyx #aerosoft

© 2021 AEROSOFT. All rights reserved. All trademarks and brand names are trademarks or registered trademarks of the respective owners.
